attributes.action: Make vegan/vegetarian and free from food on par with regular food prices
attributes.background: Make it so the prices for foods that are for people with dietary requirements such as vegan or wheat free foods are at an even cost of foods that are fine for those without those dietary requirements.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about food prices are a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
